title: Rethinking nitrate reduction: redirecting electrochemical efforts from ammonia to nitrogen for realistic environmental impacts
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,2682-2685
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00222A, Opinion
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hao Huang, Karthik Peramaiah, Kuo-Wei Huang
Electrochemical NO3− reduction to NH3 is insignificant for practical applications. Instead, NO3− contaminants should be converted into N2, recycled into NO3− chemicals, or coupled with CO2 reduction to produce value-added fertilizers if applicable.
